H0.text: what else did alexander graham bell invent other than the telephone. Metal Detector

H1.text: what else did alexander graham bell invent other than the telephone. Hydrofoil

H2.text: what else did alexander graham bell invent other than the telephone. Phonograph Improvements

H3.text: what else did alexander graham bell invent other than the telephone. Graphaphone

A4.text: Bell had four patents for hydroairplanes.

A5.text: Bell had one patent for the phonograph.

A6.text: Alexander Graham Bell initially used a 4-coil induction balance to attempt to locate a bullet lodged in the chest of American President James Garfield.

A7.text: Bell's 2-coil induction balance would go on to evolve into the popular double D coil.
